execution_plan.description: Retrieve inactive products from the store_main.products table (is_active = false) and tag results with the source database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id, name, sku, price, category_id, is_active, created_at, 'store_main' AS source_database FROM products WHERE is_active = false;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve inactive items from the store_alt.items table (active <> 'Y') and tag results with the source database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT code, title, amount_in_cents, group_ref, active, created_on, 'store_alt' AS source_database FROM items WHERE active <> 'Y';
